TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content:
Wooo 1k posts!!

EDIT: NINJAS!!!! I hate those guys.
Awww maaaaaaaaaaaaaaaan Also. Page 100

We went through 2 pages in under 10 minutes.

That's skillz.
Steam server just went down for maintenance.

We went through 2 pages in under 10 minutes.

That's skillz.

That's an awesome community for ya. I love you guys!

Could we at least get something so that we can go on with the rest of our day?

Maxmaps just told us, it isn't today.
He meant something else

I am disappoint...

Oh well, better off waiting for something that works than getting something now that's broken...

Good to know somethingawful is now another place I have to check to get the latest info about the release.

I'm generally not overly critical of Squad but surely this is a lesson that you should have learned by now: Release your information through official channels first. Not through some random post on a third party forum.

Edited July 15, 2014 by Red Iron Crown

Good to know somethingawful is now another place I have to check to get the latest info about the release.

I'm generally not overly critical of Squad but surely this is a lesson that you have learned by now: Release your information through official channels first. Not through some random post on a third party forum.

He did, he posted it on Twitter at the same time. Calm down.

Good to know somethingawful is now another place I have to check to get the latest info about the release.

I'm generally not overly critical of Squad but surely this is a lesson that you have learned by now: Release your information through official channels first. Not through some random post on a third party forum.

Yeah, information handling isn't always Squad's strong suit. Why on earth this wasn't first posted through the KSP website is just bonkers. To say nothing of Rows saying earlier that it would be released in ~1 day of the videos going up, and Max saying it would take a few days. I know this isn't an easy job, but there is some serious coordination that needs to be done.

Settle down there, fellas. I was in the midst of some coordination on this, myself. Indeed, 0.24 won't be releasing today, but I've also got something up my sleeve. No, it's not a game update, but it will hopefully answer a lot of questions. Expect it in a little while.

It's always more likely to be not today than today. Which sux cuse I want it now! ;p

Can we at least get the dev notes? 80
take note EA. *cough cough* SIMCITY *cough*

Settle down there, fellas. I was in the midst of some coordination on this, myself. Indeed, 0.24 won't be releasing today, but I've also got something up my sleeve. No, it's not a game update, but it will hopefully answer a lot of questions. Expect it in a little while.

Lemme guess, an FAQ and/or release date?
Might aswell goto sleep then. 1:17AM here in Sweden.

Settle down there, fellas. I was in the midst of some coordination on this, myself. Indeed, 0.24 won't be releasing today, but I've also got something up my sleeve. No, it's not a game update, but it will hopefully answer a lot of questions. Expect it in a little while.

what the FAQ?

edit:

Lemme guess, an FAQ and/or release date?

>implying they will ever release an exact release date

Settle down there, fellas. I was in the midst of some coordination on this, myself. Indeed, 0.24 won't be releasing today, but I've also got something up my sleeve. No, it's not a game update, but it will hopefully answer a lot of questions. Expect it in a little while.

Good to know you're working on it.

Might aswell goto sleep then. 1:17AM here in Sweden.

Yay Sweden.

Settle down there, fellas. I was in the midst of some coordination on this, myself. Indeed, 0.24 won't be releasing today, but I've also got something up my sleeve. No, it's not a game update, but it will hopefully answer a lot of questions. Expect it in a little while.

Yeah, information handling isn't always Squad's strong suit. Why on earth this wasn't first posted through the KSP website is just bonkers. To say nothing of Rows saying earlier that it would be released in ~1 day of the videos going up, and Max saying it would take a few days. I know this isn't an easy job, but there is some serious coordination that needs to be done.

For clarification's sake, I also posted THIS shortly after. Point being it's not as deep of a situation as what happened with ARM.

He did, he posted it on Twitter at the same time. Calm down.

Did I seem anything other than calm? The somethingawful post's timestamp is before anything through KSP's official channels.
A couple minute gap won't kill you people. Rowsdower is being perfectly resoanable

Settle down there, fellas. I was in the midst of some coordination on this, myself. Indeed, 0.24 won't be releasing today, but I've also got something up my sleeve. No, it's not a game update, but it will hopefully answer a lot of questions. Expect it in a little while.

For clarification's sake, I also posted THIS shortly after. Point being it's not as deep of a situation as what happened with ARM.

I appreciate your work, and I understand the situation. I understand that reddit, somethingawful, etc. are useful ways of communicating with different parts of the fanbase. At the same time, I would suggest that this kind of information should be released through the KSP website and the KSP forum first. This isn't to put down users of those other sites, but I suggest this kind of information should come from the most official channels first, not posts on 3rd parties.

A couple minute gap won't kill you people. Rowsdower is being perfectly resoanable

The time gap isn't an issue, it's the principle of how information is handled and released. Myself and others have spent a fair amount of time on the forum today expecting/hoping for a release. When we first hear it isn't going to happen, it's not through the main forum, but from somewhere else. It raises issues about where and how we should expect to get information from.

Rowsdower is being perfectly reasonable, and I think so am I. No one is yelling; it's a conversation.

I appreciate your work, and I understand the situation. I understand that reddit, somethingawful, etc. are useful ways of communicating with different parts of the fanbase. At the same time, I would suggest that this kind of information should be released through the KSP website and the KSP forum first. This isn't to put down users of those other sites, but I suggest this kind of information should come from the most official channels first, not posts on 3rd parties.

I was actually looking for approval on a forum message just as soon as I saw the thing on SA. It's a bummer that I didn't get to make it first, but it was made nonetheless. The spots you usually find me around are always the ones that'll get my attention first and yes, of course the forums are included
